summary: Two estranged brothers, traveling in a classically restored Morgan convertible, are obliged to deliver their father's ashes to his hometown in Calabria. Genziano (co-writer Marco Bonini) ... See full summary Â»
cast: Marco Bonini|Edoardo Leo|Sabrina Impacciatore|Eugenia Costantini|Gabriele Ferzetti|Tommaso Olivieri|Vinicio Marchioni|Max Mazzotta|Carlotta Natoli|Pasquale Anselmo|Valerio Aprea|Luisa De Santis|Daniela Carloni|Antonio Fulfaro|Concetta Cilona|Giancarlo Magalli
title: Diciotto anni dopo
